metadata.title: CVE-2020-9806 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.This issue is fixed in iOS 13.5 and iPadOS 13.5, tvOS 13.4.5, watchOS6.2.5, Safari 13.1.1, iTunes 12.10.7 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 11.2,iCloud for Windows 7.19. Processing maliciously crafted web content maylead to arbitrary code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-9806` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.28.3-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.28.3-2
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.28.3-2
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.28.3-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.28.3-2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.28.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.28.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.28.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.3-2
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.28.3-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.28.3-2
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.28.3-2
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.28.3-2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.28.3-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.28.3-2').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
